div.bibl: Svobodnaya Rossiya, (Free Russia)Oct. 20, 1917. BLACK-HUNDRED ADVENTURES OF JEROME P. ZAISHENKO HERE

body.p: Jerome P. Zaichenko, who was run out of Detroit with a beating is not satisfied, not appeased. For his deviltries the Russian Orthodox Reactionary Mission sent this blustering creature to the Chicago parish on the South Side.
Here this little father, instead of a sermon last Sunday burst into a storm of invectives against all progressive parishes.
After services the parishioners just plainly warned the little father that he will be asked to clear out if he again abuses and slanders the progressive parishes.
